articles.author: Grace Yarrow, Marcia Brown
articles.title: Nearly 42 million Americans lose their food stamp benefits - Politico
articles.description: The lapse in benefits could be temporary if the Trump administration complies with a recent court order requiring them to use emergency money to fund SNAP.
articles.content: On Saturday, the same judge provided the president with that direction, thanking Trump for his quick and definitive response to the courts decision and ordering the White House to either fully suppor… [+5683 chars]

articles.title: All the U.S. military strikes against alleged drug boats - PBS
articles.description: The U.S. military has killed dozens of people in targeted strikes on small vessels in waters off South America since early September.
articles.content:
